law.catch_line: When subsequent petitions may be filed after denial.
law.text: After the expiration of six (6) months from the date of entry of a determination by the commission, denying a petition for a proposed district, subsequent petitions covering the same or substantially the same territory may be filed and action taken thereon in accordance with KRS 262.100 to 262.180.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42i-5.
